extendedInfo.description: Get ready for a card game that makes all other forms of entertainment look like deadwood: AcesÂ® Gin Rummy!  The cards are dealt. You pass on the up-card and draw from the stock. Two melds already and youâve only drawn once! Sort the high cards down and discard that king. Not much deadwood, but if you knock now, you might get undercut. Itâs risky either way, but you hang in there, hoping for a spade or a seven.One more draw...and...GIN!Cast of CharactersWant to play Gin Rummy against an elegant Victorian skunk? Weâve got you covered. How about a dapper beaver in a collar and waistcoat? You can do that too. With 11 different animated characters to choose from, including a variety of well dressed ladies and gentlemen (and equally well dressed farm animals and robots), our cast of quirky characters will charm the aces out of you.Gameplay For All Skill LevelsIf youâre new to Gin Rummy, donât worry. The EASY difficulty setting is a great way to ease into the game. If youâre looking for more of a challenge, HARD will have you planning every move and really watching the discards. Whatever your skill level, our adjustable difficulty system has the right setting for you.Traditional ScoringGames in Gin Rummy can be customized to be played to 100 (if youâre looking for a quick game), 150, 250 or 300 (if youâd like a game that lasts a bit longer). Scoring follows classic rules with a 100 point bonus for winning, a 20 point bonus for each hand won, and double points for shutting out your opponent!More games from Concrete Software:PBA Bowling ChallengeAces SpadesAces HeartsWordsplosionAces Bubble PopperAces Traffic PackAces Jewel Hunt

reviews.title: Great effort
reviews.comment: Challenging and fun, great on long haul flights. No glitches, runs smoothly on Samsung 10.1.
reviews.author: Andrew Watson

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: The Ads r like commercials. Lol, they don\'t bother me because this wonderful app is...  wait for it. FREE!!!!  Great job. Coolest Gin app ever!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it....
reviews.comment: This is the most fun interface for gin ever.. Gin is a fun game and you guys have made it even better..... Its a must try for anyone who enjoys gin even remotely.....
reviews.author: Kanishka Paul

reviews.title: Nice realistic gin game
reviews.comment: Nice game for gin lovers better than most I have used. Could perhaps do with some animations for the different characters but its still great nonetheless .
reviews.author: Karthik k Swami

reviews.title: Good game play
reviews.comment: Good game. Smooth graphics.  Lots of fun!
reviews.author: BJ Custard

reviews.title: Great app!!!
reviews.comment: Enjoying this game a lot. Great graphics. Considering buying the ad free version.
reviews.author: Jay Burt

reviews.title: Its a fun game but...
reviews.comment: It is fun but there are waaaayyy too many ads. And to pay 2.99 to go ad free is a bit much. I would pay .99 for sure but not 2.99. Sorry...
reviews.author: Roxanne Slate

reviews.title: Too many ads in new update!
reviews.comment: I used to love this app.  But with the new update I\'m spending more time watching ads then playing the game!  Deleting!
reviews.author: Chad J.

reviews.title: Best gin rummy I found!
reviews.comment: The cards are easy to see.  I like the colors and graphics. I especially like the option to auto sort. .
reviews.author: Julie Dinius

reviews.title: Good fun
reviews.comment: Great implementation. No problems. Game play quite good. Love it.
reviews.author: Daniel Kustrin

reviews.title: Love It!!!
reviews.comment: Good app, nice graphics, intelligently calculating points and opponent as CPU does offer good resistance....
reviews.author: Brijesh Thakkar

reviews.title: Gin Rummy
reviews.comment: I like the app,  runs fine. Wish there weren\'t any ads. But I would pay for this. Its not too much. (Samsung galaxy s4)
reviews.author: Sheleathia Griffin

reviews.title: Awesome if it had voices
reviews.comment: I just downloaded the app and won my first game set at medium option.   Suggestions to make a fun game better would be emotions on opponent  Face and audio of words or cheers, boos etc.  I have a Samsung note 2 phone  and had no problems.   Thanks for a fun game. Please make a tablet version with larger graphics for 10.1 tablet. I want to install on my Sony xperia z. Love the game. Still needs voices  and more animation but upgrading to 5 stars anyway.
reviews.author: Kathy Rose

reviews.title: no support for problem
reviews.comment: I purchased ad-free version, and still have ads.  emailed concrete software TWICE, and did not receive response. ~~edit. My sincere apologies,  the developer did reply to both emails, and the problem has been resolved.  Thank you!!!
reviews.author: Mike J

reviews.title: Good graphics
reviews.comment: Like the look and feel, only downside is the length of ads between games,
reviews.author: Samantha Rozmaryn

reviews.title: Probably the best card game app I\'ve seen up to now.
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Luc Deault

reviews.title: Aces!
reviews.comment: This is so much fun. I had my doubts at first. But not now. TOTALLY FREE & FUN, FUN, FUN!
reviews.author: candy barlow

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Wish u could play against really ppl. That would be better
reviews.author: Michelle Frakes

reviews.title: Excellent And Dependable!!
reviews.comment: This is the game I turn to when I just HAVE to take 5-10 minutes to myself and truly relax and let the stress of the day go away. For me, it\'s like going Home! (:
reviews.author: Pamela Kay

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: This game is great!! Awesome graphics, easy format and just a fun game to play...if u like gin type games u will love this one! And its FREE! ;)
reviews.author: Wendy Peraza
